[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]This is the web site of ADR Chambers.

Our postal address is:
180 Duncan Mill Road
Toronto, Ontario, Canada M3B 1Z6

We can be reached at contact@adr.ca or by telephone at (416) 307-0000 or 1-800-318-9741 (in Canada).

Information Collection and Use

ADR Chambers collects information such as email addresses, postal addresses, name, telephone/fax numbers and payment information (e.g., credit card number and billing address) when supplied by a visitor to our site. We will not sell, rent or share this information with third parties without the consent of the person providing the information.

Our website collects no personal information automatically unless it is specifically supplied by a visitor.

Visitors who provide their email or mailing address to us may periodically receive email from us to notify them about updates to our products and services. If anyone prefers not to receive such notices, they may so indicate by sending an email to contact@adr.ca.

Visitors who supply us with their telephone numbers will only receive telephone contact from us about the courses they have registered for or the orders they have placed.

Security

When we transfer and receive sensitive information such as financial information, we redirect visitors to a secure server where data is encrypted upon sending it through our site.

Log Files

We use IP addresses to analyze trends, administer the site, track user’s movement, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. IP addresses are not linked to personally identifiable information.

Browser cookies

We use cookies to record activity at our site in order to provide better service when visitors return to our site. No personal information is collected through cookies.

External sites

This web site may contain links to other sites. ADR Chambers is not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites. We encourage our users to read the privacy statements of every web site that collects personally identifiable information.

If you feel that this site is not following its stated policy, please contact us at the above address or phone number.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
